# Instructions

**1. Go through the pre-workshop activities**
<br>We like for you to have learnt some basics about Python and Colab **before** the workshop. This way, we can use the workshop time to focus on more advanced ideas and pay more attention to solving difficulties you might encounte
r. So,  please **work on the activities given in section [Some Python Basics] before you come to the workshop**. It will take no more than 30 minutes.

if you have any questions or encounter any difficulties please reach out to us through Piazza (see below).

**2. Activate Piazza:**
<br>Please activate your Piazza account using the email from Piazza or this link. Once you have activate the account please copy and paste the following code as a question so that you are familiar with how to share code.
```{python,eval=F}
# This is a comment
name = 'Batman'

# This is another comment
if name == 'Batman':
   print('Hello Batman!')
else:
   print('Hello World!')
```
